com.vmworld.entity

Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmworld.entity.Customer

  • public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
    Model class representing a banking customer.
    Contains personal details and is linked to a single bank account.
    See Also:
    Account

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Customer()
      Default constructor initializes the customer with a new account.
      Customer(int customerId, java.lang.String customerName, long mobileNumber, Account account)
      Parameterized constructor for creating a new Customer with predefined values/attributes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Account getAccount()
      Gets the associated account.
      int getCustomerId()
      Gets the customer ID.
      java.lang.String getCustomerName()
      Gets the customer's name
      long getMobileNumber()
      Gets the mobile number
      void setAccount(Account account)
      Sets the associated account.
      void setCustomerId(int customerId)
      Sets the customer ID.
      void setCustomerName(java.lang.String customerName)
      Sets the customer's name with validation
      Name must not be null and must have at least 3 non-whitespace characters.
      void setMobileNumber(long mobileNumber)
      Sets the mobile number with validation.
      Must be a valid 10-digit Inidan mobile number.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the customer.
